bioghist.p: The Board of Trustees of Villanova University is composed of between 20 and 30 members, at least nine of whom must be members in good standing of the Order of Saint Augustine of the Province of Saint Thomas of Villanova. The Board of Trustees has responsibility over all that pertains to the University. The President and Vice Presidents of the University serve at the discretion of the board.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of records of the Board of Trustees of Villanova University. The materials consist of administrative records, correspondence, legal documents, minutes, and reports. The bulk of the collection is made up of minutes of the Board of Trustees, dating from 1848 to 2006 (early minutes are present as photocopies). There are also summaries of Board meetings from 1972 to 1997. Administrative records include lists of Trustees by class (1975-1987); committee memberships (1974-1985); board resolutions (1920-1938); drawings and descriptions of the University's coat of arms and seal and a description of the mace; and a copy of the investment policy for Villanova Endowment Funds, 1982. Correspondence and legal documents relate to Villanova's status as a University; the legal materials also include information on University service marks and the Board of Trustees' charter and by-laws, amendments, and decrees, 1848-1985 (materials from the 19th century are present as typed copies made at a later date). Finally, the collection includes general financial reports and statements (1951-2000) and reports of receipts and disbursements for the Villanovan (1948-1967) and Belle Air (1948-1967).

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
